attributes.action: Ban the sale of pornographic matterial in shops children have access to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the government to ban the sale of Pornographic material like magazines and papers like the daily sport to be banned in shops children have access and to be sold only in shops with a minimum age of 18. After watching a program on channel 4 which gaid that children from the age of 5 had seen pornographic material we need to do something to protect our children.
